tos:
- I have the right to deny any commission and/or revisions for with/without reason
- The commission may be cancelled if you are not respectful, rushy, poor communication or if i have personal issues. I will always give you a reason for why im cancelling.
- I do not make **custom made** icons
- I reserve the right to showcase work in my portfolio unless agreed to not be shown. 
- If the commission is terminated by one of the parties then i will have to be paid **proportionally** based on the progress i did
- If paying with robux, tax will have to be paid for.
- It is your responsibility to provide me clear information on each frame and i am not responsible for delays/deadline misses due to unclear communication made by the client.
- Deadlines are based within my timezone, (PST - 11:59 PM).
- I provide minor revisions for free, any major revisions may be charged for accordingly.
